description: Try our easy to follow Sausage sizzle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot dog,High fibre,Sausage,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sweet potato,Low sugar,Beef,Mushroom
name: Sausage sizzle Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Cut sweet potato into long thin wedges. Place on tray in a single layer. Bake for 35 minutes or until golden and tender.

Meanwhile, heat 1 tbs of the oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook onion, capsicum and mushroom, stirring often, for 5-7 minutes or until tender. Transfer to a plate. Cover to keep warm.

Heat remaining oil in same pan over medium heat. Cook sausages, turning, for 7 minutes or until browned and almost cooked through. Remove from pan and halve lengthways. Return to pan and cook, cut-side down, for a further 2-3 minutes or until golden and cooked through.
Fill rolls with vegetable mixture and sausages. Top with cheese and drizzle with mustard. Scatter parsley over wedges and serve with rolls.
